title: Terms of Service
overview: These terms outline the conditions for using PopData Insights' products and services.

content.description: Users are granted access to population data services based on subscription plans.
Users must comply with all applicable laws and regulations when using our services.
PopData Insights retains ownership of all population data provided through its services.
Users are granted a license to use the data for specific purposes outlined in their agreements.
PopData Insights is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
We provide our services on an 'as is' basis, without warranties of any kind.
